info.name: BBV Blue Recs
info.description: Turns sufficiently recommended comments blue instead of green, and replaces the thumbs up icon with a Giants logo.
info.additionalInfo: Credit to plen of www.pensionplanpuppets for the original code, jmsmorris for editing it for use on www.bluebirdbanter.com, and getupkid for tweaking the code to work with SBN United.
